meanings.definition: Existing beyond what is obvious or admitted; intentionally hidden.
meanings.sent1: She had an ulterior motive for helping him with his homework.
meanings.sent2: The detective suspected there was an ulterior reason for the sudden disappearance.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ulterior plan to steal the fish from the bowl was foiled by the vigilant dog.
meanings.sent4: His smile hid an ulterior sadness that no one else could see.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley held an ulterior danger that sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: Situated beyond or on the farther side; coming at a subsequent time.
meanings.sent1: The ulterior room at the end of the hallway was used for storage.
meanings.sent2: The ulterior meeting was scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent3: The ulterior bus arrived just as she was about to leave.
meanings.sent4: The ulterior path led to a hidden garden behind the house.
meanings.sent5: The ulterior part of the forest was untouched by human hands.
